TextView.android:text: PixelPlusDI offers DI and VFX services for TV commercials, TV series, Web series, Short films, Feature films, Documentaries and Promos. Madhusudan Shi, Director of Photography (Cinematographer) is a Post Graduate from Film and Television Institute of India, Pune, INDIA specialisation in Motion Pictute Photography. he has to his credit numerous Advertisement films, Feature films, documentaries, Television series as well as Music videos.
